column4: Hello everyone.  I have been googling for 2 days now.  Time to ask for assistance.  I am having an issue with libc being "in an unexpected directory".  I cannot repalce it.  But apt-get -f install is broken becasue of it.  Is this repairable?
I am booted into a live cd and have chrooted, but still I can't seem to repair it.
define repair, what exactly are you trying to fix?
